Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Stephanie's life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]: At some point in the apocalypse, Stephanie joined a community called the Hilltop Colony . Stephanie watches in horror as Rick and Ethan get in a fight, resulting in the latter's death. She then watches as Kal and Eduardo attempt to arrest Rick. Fortunately, Jesus cools down the situation. Later that day, she is among the Hilltoppers to attend Ethan's funeral. Stephanie leans herself against a table while talking to another Hilltop resident. Stephanie is among the several Hilltoppers killed during the Saviors ' tainted weapons attack on Hilltop. She was either killed during the battle itself or was injured and later succumbed to her wounds from the tainted weapons. [1]
Death[]: Killed By Negan Smith (Indirectly Caused) Simon (Caused) The Saviors (Caused) Zombies (Alive) Following the Saviors' attack on the Hilltop, Stephanie is among the residents killed in battle or devoured by her reanimated militia members, who succumbed to the infection after being wounded by tainted weapons on Simon's orders. The Militia (Before Reanimation) Stephanie is later put down to prevent reanimation.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Stephanie has killed: Possibly a few zombies
Appearances[]: " Knots Untie " (No Lines) " Go Getters " (No Lines)
Gallery[]: For more images of Stephanie, please visit Background Survivors (TV Series)/Hilltop Colony .
Trivia[]: In the episode " Go Getters ", Stephanie was originally going to have a line and be credited for her appearance. However, her line was cut and she remained uncredited. The character is named after her actress, Stephanie Rae.
